name: Mad GunZ - shooting game
description:
Imagine this: you wake up, feed your beloved kitty, and then — all hell breaks loose! Where did Mr. Fluffy go and what is... is that an armored turkey? Does it have anything to do with these... unicorns? Uh, what's going here? Well you’re gonna find out in this adventurous new entry in the gun shooting games genre. Mad Gunz comes from the school of online shooters that have strange, cute, pixel art.

Mad GunZ is not like regular online FPS, or other gun shooting games that haven’t surprised you very much. No, this online shooter won’t teach you any new tactics or make endlessly fiddle with your gun settings. Just get out there and shoot your rivals with a banana gun, or a hamster thrower, or slap them with a handbag! Break into the shooting games online arena and crush everything in the wackiest new shooter games free!

So, this is what Mad GunZ — new guns game online is about:
- Far from realistic, but SUPER beautiful pixel art!
- The most incredibly weird guns - beat your rivals with a handbag with a dog in it, a huge lollipop or a magic wand. Or just shoot them with… cat fur!
- Enemies from the best of gun games, shooter games and online FPS games, including zombies, crazy chickens and even a mad octopus!
- Plus! Mad GunZ is the first of the online gun shooting games in which you can see your feet!

Still don’t wanna play this awesome, mad FPS shooters? Think it’s just another one of those online FPS? Well we think you’ll love it much more than any of those other gun games, because Mad GunZ has:
- The easiest shooters controls
- 5 unique maps with easter eggs from your favorite movies and games
- A bunch of strange, wild enemies.

Why are you still reading this? Duh. I’m tired of talking about the best online shooter (according to me)! Go get it and start playing! Go save Mr. Fluffy!
